title: 1.12.2 Flan's Mod 打开二战防具箱第三页时候游戏会崩溃
author: 胡博
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I let you down. Sorry :(

Time: 8/29/19 9:07 AM
Description: Rendering screen

java.lang.NullPointerException: Rendering screen

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/FlansMods/FlansMod/issues/913
此问题已修复，更新到最新的测试版本即可
https://github.com/FlansMods/FlansMod/releases

replies.author: 胡博
